About some stuff.

Hi, my name is Anton, and I like colouring, long walks on the beach, and getting caught in almost inevitable London rain.

I'm a electronics building, code hacking, e-textiles sewing, unfortunately jaded individual - who uses Emacs out of spite.

  • Studying Music Computing @ Goldsmiths College, University of London
  • Constructing E-Textiles applications for Kids
  • Developing Web Apps for Musicians
  • Writing Circullum for Arduino
  • Designing [[http://muushi.ilyfa.com][3D Touch Interfaces]] out of fabric
  • Creating interfaces to aid in the understand of electronics and software design
